mapper.insert: insert into video_app_mes (app_id, app_subject, introduction, user_id, solve, amazing, money, right_user_id, region) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amazing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rightUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update video_app_mes set app_subject = #{appSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asktime = #{asktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, solve = #{solve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amazing = #{amazing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, right_user_id = #{rightUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select app_id, app_subject, introduction, user_id, asktime, solve, amazing, money, right_user_id, region from video_app_mes where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select app_id, app_subject, introduction, user_id, asktime, solve, amazing, money, right_user_id, region from video_app_mes
select app_id from video_app_mes where app_id = (select MAX(app_id) from pic_app_mes)
select app_id, app_subject, introduction, user_id, asktime, solve, amazing, money, right_user_id, region from video_app_mes where region like '%${region}%' and solve = #{solve,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select app_id, app_subject, introduction, user_id, asktime, solve, amazing, money, right_user_id, region from video_app_mes where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
